segments.text: Oh, what a lovely scene I'm witnessing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so cute, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is quite the little acrobat, balancing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, she's just the picture of innocence, waiting for her brother to share some cookies with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mother, on the other hand, seems to be in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what she's thinking about, standing there drying dishes like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be really deep in thought to not notice the water overflowing all around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sorry for her, missing out on the fun her children are having.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I suppose everyone needs a little moment of peace and quiet now and then.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all just so very charming and heartwarming.
segments.speaker: PAR
